// Output Macros

#define pi(x) printf("%d",x)
#define pli(x) printf("%ld",x)

#define pllicf(x) printf("%I64d",x)
#define pc(x) printf("%c",x)
#define ps(x) printf("%s",x)
#define pd(x) printf("%lf",x)

#define pri(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define prli(x) printf("%ld\n",x)
#define prlli(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define prllicf(x) printf("%I64d\n",x)
#define prc(x) printf("%c\n",x)
#define prs(x) printf("%s\n",x)
#define prd(x) printf("%lf\n",x)

#define bitcount __builtin_popcount
#define gcd __gcd

#define llu long long unsigned int
#define lli long long int
#define li long int
#define fi first
#define se second
#define pb push_back
#define mod 1000000007
#define mp make_pair

#define vi vector<int>
#define vlli vector<long long int>
#define pii pair<int,int>
int a[100];
int main()
{
	//freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    //freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
	int t,i,j,k;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int sum=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			sum+=a[i];
		}
		int temp=sum-(n*(n-1))/2;
		if(temp%n!=0)
			cout<<"-1"<<endl;
		else
		{
			int x=temp/n,ans=0;
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				if(a[i]-x>0)
					ans+=a[i]-x;
				x++;
			}
			cout<<ans<<endl;
		}
	}			
	return 0;
}
